adrFormatAddress: 3410 Broadway, New York, NY 10031, USA

editorialSummary.text: Fast-food chain offering Mexican fare, including design-your-own burritos, tacos & bowls.

originalText.text: I know this industry is hard. Dealing with delivery guys, customers and each other but you guys have to do better in order for this great access to the neighborhood stays for the long run. Tonight service experience was absolutely horrendous. Staff members yelling at each other embarrassing themselves in front of customers not working as a team very unprofessional two hours till closing and 86 chips and I know for a fact it’s because they don’t make a fresh batch. I used to work for Chipotle many years ago so I know you guys can do better. I know what the company stands for tonight service was not representation of it.

originalText.text:
I have to give a shoutout to this location. I live 2 blocks away today was only the third time I’ve come in because usually I’m stumbling through Taco Bell at 3am. The food has been consistently fresh but this shoutout is for the employees!

I’ve seen some shall we say “characters” come through and the staff is always courteous and professional when addressing some of the neighborhood riff raff that wanders in. That and they are truly friendly and kind. It’s a very welcome addition to the neighborhood and Hope that management takes good care of these employees…. It’s a tough industry!!! Thank you Broadway Chipotle!!

Oh!! Also the restroom…. Sparkling clean. Thanks again, you all rock!

originalText.text:
I eat at Chipotle fairly often and this one is located near my house and it's horrible... the food is almost always stale. Typically I'll grab the steak or Carne Asada and here it's always dry.

I go out of my way and drive to the location near 157th simply because the food, atmosphere and staff there are much better.

The layout of this restaurant doesn't make much sense either. Chipotle corporate; please rectify this location.

It's really shocking how quality can vary by location...

originalText.text: 6 months ago I had a severe bacterial infection in the night that I ate a chipotle bowl on this restaurant. I got hospitalized, and they found out it was the food. I got better after the infection, but 2 months ago I started having Insomnia, anxiety, diahrrea and constipation. It's been four months, and I still have it. Went to the doctors. They said is either SIBO or IBS caused by past food poisoning. One meal from this restaurant changed my life... maybe forever. Please, do not eat from this restaurant or any chipotle restaurant. Do your research, chipotle is always having problems with the spread of bacterias and viruses, and they have even been legally accused for this. Consider this an advice and a warning.

originalText.text: The staff is friendly and efficient, ensuring orders are accurate and quickly prepared. The interior is clean and welcoming, making it a great spot for a quick lunch or dinner. Highly recommend for anyone in the area that wants good food
